text:
Do NOT let the side effects steer you from taking the #vaccine when offered! 💉❌

I had muscle aches, chills + a temp of 37.5°C - all resolved with regular paracetamol & fluids! 🥛

Nowhere close to having the #virus itself! 🦠

#AstraZeneca #COVIDVaccination #COVID19 #NHS https://t.co/mrLnlk4Bvg
